Author: ttthad
Text: Your body took over because you needed food. Purging will make your metabolism worse and make recovery that much longer. I completely get it, but that's the truth. Also a vane reason but one that works for me sometimes is that you'll look much puffier tomorrow if you purge.

Author: thedevilstrombones
Text: You deserve to eat. You’ve been fasting and you’re body needed the food it was missing out on. Don’t feel guilty about eating, and don’t be so hard on yourself. Purging and worrying about it is just going to cause you more stress. Just forgive yourself and try to move past it  You have support on here, and if you need to talk just shoot me a dm<3
